channel.title: RSWorld - A class of it's own
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://rsworld.org/images/darkinferno/misc/logo.png[/img][/CENTER]
The navy color code means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color code means the feature has been finished.
[size=18pt]Server Progress[/size]
[ul][li]Minigames[/li] [list] [li]Barrows - 0% Bounty Hunter - 0% Clan Wars - 0% Warriors Guild - 0% Pest Control - 0% Castle Wars - 0%[/li] [/list][/ul]
[ul][li]Combat[/li] [list] [li]Under progress...[/li] [/list][/ul]
[ul][li]Skills[/li] [list] [li]Under progress...[/li] [/list][/ul]
[size=18pt]Client Progress[/size]
[ul][li]Data[/li] [list] [li]602 Animations & Gfx - 100% 508 Maps & Objects - 0% 634 Items - 0% 602 Npc's - 0% 633 Characters - 0%[/li] [/list][/ul]
[ul][li]Interfaces[/li] [list] [li]Deposit Box - 100% Bank - 100% Login - 100% Options - 60% Equipment - 40% Friends, Ignores - 0% Clan Chat - 0%
More to come...[/li] [/list][/ul]
[ul][li]Misc[/li] [list] [li]Perfect Hitmarks with fading - 0% Fully Functional Orbs - 0%[/li] [/list][/ul]
[CENTER][IMG]http://puu.sh/nTz7[/img][IMG]http://puu.sh/nT8t[/img][IMG]http://puu.sh/obqd[/img][/CENTER] [size=18pt]Support Us[/size]
By replying you're showing us support to RSWorld project.

item.title: RSWorld - A class of it's own
item.dc:creator: @Fexis Fexis
item.description:
@Fexis wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:12, topic:439197”][quote author=Fexis link=topic=541898.msg3970314#msg3970314 date=1334087112]

The login, options & lobby isn’t hard… but the positioning is a pain and it takes time.

And about the 600+ data… People say they like old-schools… but when the server’s being hosted… there’s barly people joining because of there’s no new data… Just being honest what I’ve been thru.

yep, since the average playerbase age is barely 12, kids jizz on graphics these days,
the don’t give a fuck about gameplay anymore, only items
[/quote]There’s barely no more players back from 06-07 that plays RSPS’s still, they’re not familiar with the old-school, that’s why.

True, I probably will make an 600+ also. Just probably searching an partner.[/quote]I’m searching for developers, anyways good luck with yours.

Read full topic
item.source: RSWorld - A class of it's own

item.title: RSWorld - A class of it's own
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Fexis, post:6, topic:439197”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=541898.msg3970278#msg3970278 date=1334085689]
does those detail buttons work?
does the fullscreen/fixed work?
does the background animate?
[/quote]What detail button? Fullscreen & animated background is coming soon.

Currently I’m working on the current RuneScapes gameframe.

[quote author=RandQm link=topic=541898.msg3970277#msg3970277 date=1334085622]

Client Progress

Data
    602 Animations & Gfx - 100%
    508 Maps & Objects - 0%
    634 Items - 0%
    602 Npc's - 0%
    633 Characters - 0%

not another one :mad:

gl I suppose
[/quote]Isn’t like the rest, they’re bunch of leechers from HybridPvP and Insidia…

I’ve started from clean renamed client & server base.[/quote]

Good Luck my friend. It looks pretty simple to do that login lobby I have one like that too And it’s not the meanning by having insidia or hybrid shit. The problem is that it’s still on 600+ Data…

Read full topic
